sentence.Network_en: This is the weapon that he used to defend himself withal.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就是他用来自卫的武器.

sentence.Network_en: But, withal , a real renaissance occurred, and America recovered her poetic voice.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过, 此外还出现一种真正的文艺复兴, 美国诗坛则有了新气象.

sentence.Network_en: He was hollow - chested, squint - eyed, and rather shambling, but spry enough withal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他胸膛低陷, 眼睛斜视, 步履蹒跚, 但又着实生气勃勃.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(W) ... with 有 withal 此外 withdraw from 离开.
依然的... ... still: 尽管如此,依然 withal: 此外,而且,依然 e.g. I still want to finish it.( 我还是想完成它).
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... with 和 withal 又;□且 withdraw 撤回.

list.abs: nevertheless one couldn't help but like him . he was an indefatigable worker , a man who hadn't a single thought in his head but paint . and cunning as lynx withal .然而人们还是情不自禁地喜欢他，他是一位不知疲倦的人，一个脑子里除了绘画什么都不想的人，而且还狡猾得像一只山猫。
but the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .圣灵显在各人身上，是叫人得益处。
Julius Caesar -... ... I grant I am a woman;but withal 我承认我是妇人；可是 I grant I am a woman;but withal 我是妇人，可.

in a Dating addition , you agree to comply withal applicable laws , rules , codes and regulations regarding the transmission of technical data exported from the United States .而且，鉴于从美国传递输出技术数据，您同意要遵守所有相关法律，条例，法规和规定。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: originally as with all

means.word_mean: 1. despite anything to the contrary (usually following a concession);

sentences.sentence: "although I'm a little afraid, however I'd like to try it"
"while we disliked each other, nevertheless we agreed"
"he was a stern yet fair master"
"granted that it is dangerous, all the same I still want to go"

auth_sentence.content: Blimey, one of them might say from withal.

auth_sentence.content: She...was so sweet and kind, and withal seemed...so dependent on him.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: She...was so sweet and kind, and withal seemed...so dependent on him.

auth_sentence.content: Yet he is, withal, somewhat less martial than most English teachers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet he is, withal, somewhat less martial than most English teachers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet he is, withal, somewhat less martial than most English teachers.
